body.name: WLIVE 9-Drawer Dresser, Fabric Storage Tower for Bedroom, Hallway, Closet, Tall Chest Organizer Unit for Bedroom with Fabric Bins, Steel Frame, Wood Top, Easy Pull Handle, Light Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs 6 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Multifunction Tower: This fabric dresser for bedroom is ideal for wherever you want to keep clutter under control, such as bedrooms, playrooms, entryways; matches perfectly with other WLIVE storage organizers.

Roomy Storage Space: The 9 foldable deep drawers are so spacious that they provide endless organizational possibilities. Wooden top is great for lamps, clocks, glasses and other daily essentials, keeping them in your reach.

Sturdy and Durable: Strong steel frame and water-resistant wood top offer stable support and ensure years of use; 4 adjustable plastic feet can protect your floor from scratches and are also designed for uneven ground.

Safe for Your Family: Feel free to place chest of drawers anywhere; the anti-tipping accessories included can prevent incidents; the non-woven fabric is breathable and harmless, suitable for teens and adults.
Overall Dimension: The fabric dresser measures 39.4" L x 11.8" W x 39.5" H. The storage tower comes with instructions and all hardware needed for installation, easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Dream Come True for My Daughter's Closet!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the WLIVE 9-Drawer Dresser to help my daughter keep her bedroom closet organized, and it has truly exceeded our expectations.Assembly and Setup:Setting up the dresser was a breeze, and the instructions were clear. It was ready to use in no time.Design and Appearance:The dresser's dark grey color and modern design perfectly complement my daughter's room. It not only adds style but also enhances the overall organization of her closet.Drawer Organization:The dresser's nine drawers have been a game-changer for my daughter. She can easily find her socks, underwear, jeans, jeggings, summer pants, winter pants, towels, pajamas, shorts, and biker shorts—all neatly organized and accessible.Storage Capacity:The ample storage space in each drawer allows her to keep a wide range of clothing and personal items well-organized.Build Quality:The dresser's sturdy construction gives us confidence that it will withstand the daily wear and tear of a child's room.Functionality:Functionally, this dresser is a lifesaver. It has made her daily routine smoother, and it's become an essential part of her morning routine.Ease of Use:The easy-pull handles on the drawers are perfect for a child, making it effortless for her to access her belongings.Space Efficiency:The dresser's compact design maximizes space in her closet, allowing us to make the most of the available room.Value for Money:Considering its quality, functionality, and the joy it brings to my daughter's daily life, this dresser is worth every penny.Long-Term Durability:We've had this dresser in my daughter's room for several months, and it still looks and functions as if it were brand new.Overall Impression:The WLIVE 9-Drawer Dresser has not only transformed my daughter's closet but also made her daily routines more organized and efficient. Her joy and gratitude say it all.Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Five stars for its design, organization features, and the happiness it has brought to my daughter's life. A heartfelt "thank you" from her makes it all worthwhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WLIVE 9-Drawer Dresser - Organizational Bliss and Stylish Storage for Your Bedroom!
reviews.reviewText: The WLIVE 9-Drawer Dresser has proven to be a game-changer in my bedroom, offering a perfect blend of practical storage, stylish design, and functional organization. This fabric storage tower has elevated the aesthetics and functionality of my space, and I am thoroughly impressed with its performance.First and foremost, the design of this dresser is both chic and versatile. The neutral color palette and contemporary design make it a seamless addition to any bedroom decor. The fabric-covered drawers add a touch of elegance, creating a cohesive and visually pleasing storage solution.The organizational capacity of the nine drawers is truly remarkable. From clothing and accessories to linens and other essentials, each drawer provides ample space for neatly arranging and categorizing items. The varying drawer sizes offer versatility, allowing for tailored storage solutions for different items.The fabric material covering the drawers adds a layer of sophistication while maintaining a lightweight and breathable quality. This not only contributes to the overall aesthetic appeal but also ensures that stored items are well-ventilated and protected.Assembly was surprisingly straightforward, thanks to the clear instructions and all necessary hardware included. The construction of the dresser feels sturdy and reliable, providing confidence in its durability. The unit stands securely on its own, and the fabric drawers glide smoothly in and out, making access to stored items effortless.The top surface of the dresser adds an additional functional space for decorative items, a vanity mirror, or other personal touches. The flat, stable surface provides a convenient area for display without sacrificing the dresser's organizational capabilities.The compact size of the WLIVE 9-Drawer Dresser makes it suitable for various room sizes, making it a practical choice for apartments or smaller bedrooms. The space-saving design does not compromise on storage capacity, making it an ideal solution for maximizing vertical space.In conclusion, the WLIVE 9-Drawer Dresser is a stellar choice for anyone in need of a stylish and functional storage solution for their bedroom. Its organizational prowess, contemporary design, and ease of assembly make it a top-tier dresser in its category. If you're looking to declutter your space with a touch of elegance, this dresser is a definite five-star recommendation! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The drawers are not all flush. There are gaps when looking from front.
reviews.reviewText: Nice for small space and easy to put together. But the drawers are not all flush. You can see gaps open to what is inside the drawer. Color is accurate and it's sturdy. If the gaps don't bother you - good for the $.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deep drawers and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I love the soft lightweight drawers. And it was pretty easy to assemble. The only pain in the ass were the drawer handles. But if you don't have arthritis, or other hand problems it won't effect you. I needed a dresser for my room and this did the job. it's sturdy, and stylish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Packaged nicely, easy to assemble, extra parts, thick drawers
reviews.reviewText: Was a little skeptical of buying a cloth drawer dresser, but after getting it all set up it seems really well!• Everything was packaged nicely and all pieces were wrapped in their own protective bags (no scratches, bends, dents, tears, or chips on anything).• Instructions were relatively clear with no written instructions.• As someone with neurological issues, using tools is a bit of a challenge and I had to break out my own screwdriver and wrench because the ones they gave weren’t big enough for me to grab (it’s just generic tools that come with any furniture). But for the most part it was pretty easy and not too difficult to assemble. So easy my 4 year old was able to help and we got it done in about an hour!• Never have I had a furniture kit have every single metal fastener have extra pieces until now! It even came with an extra foot and an extra handle for the drawer. 100% appreciate that.• I was originally skeptical of the cloth drawers and knowing how flimsy they can be, but these are pretty thick and sturdy. They should hold for a long time as long as my son isn’t punching them or something crazy.This will hopefully last several years before we can upgrade to a wooden dresser, but my son love it, it’s pretty sturdy, and the fact that I can label the drawers is so great!
